body:
One day on Avicus, I did /server mapdev, and I was able to get in somehow. The server contained maps that were not officially released on the regular Nebula servers.

So, I'm wondering if we're supposed to be allowed on that server.
body_tagged:
One day on Avicus, I did /server mapdev, and I was able to get in somehow. The server contained maps that were not officially released on the regular Nebula servers.

So, I'm wondering if we're supposed to be allowed on that server.
title: Question, especially for the Map Devs.

replies.body: The MapDev server is opened up for special events or map testing. An example of this was the Christmas Party.
replies.body_tagged: The MapDev server is opened up for special events or map testing. An example of this was the Christmas Party.

replies.body: Btw Smidalt and I found out that cold city was a bit big and very laggy. Just saying.
replies.body_tagged: Btw Smidalt and I found out that cold city was a bit big and very laggy. Just saying.

replies.body: I noticed the excessive amount of lag on this map too, I'll fix it soon.
replies.body_tagged: I noticed the excessive amount of lag on this map too, I'll fix it soon.

replies.body: Yeah me and some walls players played a game of Tetris Winter on that server.
